channel.title: Real Raise 101
channel.description:
Are you getting the raises you want?
Did you know that getting consistent raises can make you as much as $1,000,000 more over your career?
A few minutes day using this easy, simple audio course get get you on track for Real Raises for the rest of your career, starting right now.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Secrets, tips, tools, and techniques to get the raise you really want.
channel.itunes:summary: Are you getting the raises you want? Did you know that getting consistent raises can make you as much as $1,000,000 more over your career? A few minutes day using this easy, simple audio course get get you on track for Real Raises for the rest of your career, starting right now.
channel.itunes:author: David Hubbard & Kathy Dailey
channel.itunes:keywords: get a raise, raise, salary increase, job, career, negotiation, salary negotiation

item.title: Lesson 1 - Getting Started
item.description:
Have you ever been passed over for a raise you deserved? Have you ever wondered why you don’t get te raises you know you deserve?
Have you watched other, less deserving co-workers get your raise or promotion while your boss tells you how much you’re appreciated, but right now a raise for you just isn’t feasible?
This lesson starts you on your journey to substantial raises.
item.itunes:subtitle: The first step on you your path to Real Raises
item.itunes:summary: Are you stuck with an annual cost of living raise every year? With Real Raise 101, you'll learn the secrets to getting a substantial raise, year after year. You'll find out how to enjoy the work you do, while experiencing financial freedom and having the confidence that you are at the top of the game.
item.itunes:author: David Hubbard and Kathy Dailey
item.itunes:keywords: raise,get a raise,pay raise,salary increase,pay increase

item.title: Lesson 2 - Where To Begin?
item.description:
Why is it crucial to your career to get a real raise every year?
Where are you, today, right now, in your raise skills?
You'll answer these questions, and see you how to determine exactly what you want in a raise.
item.itunes:subtitle: Where To Begin
item.itunes:author: David Hubbard and Kathy Dailey
item.itunes:keywords: raise,get a raise,pay raise,salary increase,pay increase

item.title: Lesson 3 - Getting A Raise Simplified
item.description: Getting a raise simplified. Two key concepts you can't be without.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Simple Way To Look At It
item.itunes:summary: Getting a raise simplified. Two key concepts you can't be without.
item.itunes:author: David Hubbard and Kathy Dailey
item.itunes:keywords: raise,get a raise,pay raise,salary increase,pay increase

item.title: Lesson 4 - Define Your Raise
item.description:
How much should your raise be?
How are you going to get it if you don't know how much? Learn special ways to define your raise that make it easier to get the ideal money and position you want.
item.itunes:subtitle: How much should your raise be?
item.itunes:summary: How much should your raise be? How are you going to get it if you don't know how much? Learn special ways to define your raise that make it easier to get the ideal money and position you want.
item.itunes:author: David Hubbard and Kathy Dailey
item.itunes:keywords: raise,get a raise,pay raise,salary increase,pay increase

item.title: Lesson 5 - They Actually Want to Give You a Raise
item.description: The secret of why raises are given. Do you know what that reason is? In order to get that raise, there are 2 things you must do.
item.itunes:subtitle: They Actually Want to Give You a Raise
item.itunes:summary: The secret of why raises are given. Do you know what that reason is? In order to get that raise, there are 2 things you must do.
item.itunes:author: David Hubbard and Kathy Dailey
item.itunes:keywords: raise,get a raise,pay raise,salary increase,pay increase

item.title: Lesson 6 - Who's Giving You A Raise?
item.description: Who is involved in getting you your raise? Do you know? Learn some of the negotiating tactics that will almost certainly be used against you and the counter strategies you can use to come out on top.
item.itunes:subtitle: Who's Giving You A Raise?
item.itunes:summary: Who is involved in getting you your raise? Do you know? Learn some of the negotiating tactics that will almost certainly be used against you and the counter strategies you can use to come out on top.
item.itunes:author: David Hubbard and Kathy Dailey
item.itunes:keywords: raise,get a raise,pay raise,salary increase,pay increase
